entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump A study in South Korea shows the vapor droplets from a cough can carry Covid-19 up to 12 feet at the same general height. N95 masks will filter vapor sized droplets up to 95%. This is why all Americans need access to these masks. What is Trump doing to make this happen?
